#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 100005
#define mp make_pair
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define llu unsigned long long
using namespace std;
 
int gcd(int a,int b){if (b==0) return a;else return gcd(b,a%b);}
 
#define debug(args...) {dbg,args; cerr<<endl;}
struct debugger
{template<typename T> debugger& operator,(const T& v)
 {cerr<< v <<" ";
  return *this;
 }
}dbg;
 
inline void inp(int &n)
{
  n = 0;
  int ch = gc();
  int sign = 1;
  while(ch < '0' || ch > '9') {
    if (ch == '-') sign = -1;
    ch = gc();
  }
  while(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
    n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + ch - '0', ch = gc();
  n = n*sign;
}
 
inline void outp(llu a)
{
  char snum[25];
  int i=0;
  do
  {
    snum[i++]=a%10+48;
    a=a/10;
  } while(a!=0);
  i=i-1;
  while(i>=0)
    pc(snum[i--]);
  pc('\n');
}
 
int main()
{
   //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
   //freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
   int t;
   inp(t);
   while(t--)
   {
       int n,m;
       inp(n);inp(m);
       if(n==1) outp(m);
       else if(m==1) outp(n);
       else outp((gcd(n-1,m-1)+1));
   }
   return 0;
}
